# 分析

## coredump
1. `ulimit -c unlimited`
2. `apt install gdb`
3. `gcore 675 -o ab.core` 生成 coredump
4. `readelf -l core.675` 查看coredump 文件的程序头表
   ```
   └─$ readelf -l core.675
	Elf file type is CORE (Core file)
	Entry point 0x0
	There are 16 program headers, starting at offset 64

	Program Headers:
	Type           Offset             VirtAddr           PhysAddr
					FileSiz            MemSiz              Flags  Align
	NOTE           0x000000000008a3c0 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002bf8 0x0000000000000000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000003c0 0x0000559a57eca000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000001000 0x0000000000001000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000013c0 0x0000559a57ecd000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000001000 0x0000000000001000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000023c0 0x0000559a57ece000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000001000 0x0000000000001000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000033c0 0x0000559a58741000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000021000 0x0000000000021000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000243c0 0x00007f1f29179000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000003000 0x0000000000003000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000273c0 0x00007f1f2917c000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000026000 0x0000000000026000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x000000000004d3c0 0x00007f1f2934e000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000004000 0x0000000000004000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000513c0 0x00007f1f29352000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002000 0x0000000000002000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000533c0 0x00007f1f29354000 0x0000000000000000
					0x000000000000d000 0x000000000000d000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000603c0 0x00007f1f2936d000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002000 0x0000000000002000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000623c0 0x00007f1f2936f000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000001000 0x0000000000001000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000633c0 0x00007f1f2939f000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002000 0x0000000000002000  R      0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000653c0 0x00007f1f293a1000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002000 0x0000000000002000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000673c0 0x00007ffe71134000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000021000 0x0000000000021000  RW     0x1
	LOAD           0x00000000000883c0 0x00007ffe711c0000 0x0000000000000000
					0x0000000000002000 0x0000000000002000  R E    0x1
   ```
5. `dd if=core.675 of=linux-vdso.dso bs=1 skip=558016 count=8192` - 0x883c0=558016,0x2000=8192

## vdso
> https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man7/vdso.7.html
